name: Ruins of Thundertree
description: Abandoned village destroyed 30 years ago by Mount Hotenow eruption. Overrun by ash zombies and mutated plants. Now home to young green dragon Venomfang.
atmosphere: Eerie silence. Overgrown with dangerous plant life. Crumbling buildings. Warning sign: 'DANGER! Plant monsters AND zombies!'
key_areas: 6. Ruined Store - 2 giant spiders with webs
7. Dragon's Tower - Venomfang lair, wizard's treasure
9. Herbalist Shop - Mirna's emerald necklace (200 gp)
13. Dragon Cultists - 6 cultists led by Favric
dragon_tactics: Venomfang flees at half HP, will return for revenge later
side_quest: Mirna's heirloom - emerald necklace in area 9
